answers.answer: I failed mine by a few points. I did eat and drink tho the night before. With the 3 hour they have you fast. No food or drinks for 12 hours before your test. I passed my 3 hour. Just a heads up it's gonna suc. Bring a book or magazine as you will be bored during that time and be prepared to give your blood every hour until your 3 hours is up. 4 times total. That was the hardest thing for me. Good luck!

Yea i failed it and took the awfully long fast one  and drank that disgusting  drink... lol . I found out I have hypoglycemia,  not diabetes... it gets worse during pregnancy  for me. I have to avoid sugar.  Good luck!
